talk.author: did:plc:uunmq5y7wu25xg7xdcvke6pv
talk.utter: I’ve only ever did screenplay stuff after I’ve already done a lot of stuff out there. I got to a point where I didn’t quite need to have everything out there as much.

talk.author: did:plc:ggoujcszegvaaq5bhmog4cvw
talk.utter: I felt the same when I was boarding, I wasn't bothered the work wouldn't be on the shelf. On NOAH I was still working from the same desk I drew comics at but it was like my entire perspective shifted.

talk.author: did:plc:uunmq5y7wu25xg7xdcvke6pv
talk.utter: "I've got enough stuff for a decent epitaph already. I can be more chill."
